entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
